entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10 except minus 2 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10 except minus 2 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:23 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22 except minus 10 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22 except minus 10 near the Alberta border. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 08:23 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
